Grace Armah (amụrụ na 22 Septemba na afo 1958) bụ nwanyị Ghana lara ezumike nká na-eme egwuregwu track and field nke bụ ọkachamara na 100 mita na ihe omume ogologo
O ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ọla nchara na afọ 1984 na 1985 nke African Championships
Ihe kacha mma ya na 100 mita bụ 11.98

O mekwara asọmpi maka Ghana na 1984 Summer Olympics na Los Angeles dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana 4 × 100 mita, nke mechara nke ise na okpomọkụ nke ọkara ikpeazụ ma ghara ịga n'ihu na agba ikpeazụ.
